name: A Guillotine
description:
"I realize it's a spiral, not an orbit. I'm going in circles, but I'm really not. I will eventually end somewhere. And I know where that somewhere is."

<h3>A weird text-based pseudo-game about making weird text-based pseudo-games.</h3>

<p><a href="../LD/"> Made for Ludum dare 36.</a> Isaque Sanches. August, 2016.</p>
